articles.title: New weather satellite reveals spectacular images of Earth - European Space Agency
articles.description: Europe’s latest weather satellite, the Meteosat Third Generation Imager, has just delivered its first view of Earth – revealing conditions over Europe, Africa and the Atlantic in remarkable detail.
articles.content:
